modName: Fire Wraiths - New creature based off of the Ice wraith
summary: A fire version of the Ice Wraith, available for use in other mods.
descriptionHtml:
This is a red and fire version of the Ice Wraith from Skyrim. It comes with custom textures for the creature, \"Fire Wraith Teeth,\" and a plugin that already has the creature imported.

Includes:
- Red \"Fire Wraith\" meshes/textures
- Red \"Fire Wraith Teeth\" meshes/textures
- A plugin that adds a new creature race called \"Fire Wraith.\" (to see this creature in action, type \"coc firewraithtest\" into the console.

In the plugin, I have essentially duplicated the Ice Wraith Race and replaced the necessary things to make it function properly. Sounds and animations are still the same, but instead of the blue aura, it has a fire trail that it leaves behind. It also has the appropriate death items that have been modified in effect and appearance to coincide with a Fire Wraith.

You may use everything in this file for:
-Your own personal use
-Any mods that you decide to redistribute or publish

But: Remember to give me proper credit if you decide to publish it :)
author: Penguinchao
